meanings.definition: A song originating among the common people of a country or area.
meanings.sent1: The folksong told stories of everyday life in the village.
meanings.sent2: She hummed a folksong while working in the fields.
meanings.sent3: The folksong about the mischievous cat always made the children giggle.
meanings.sent4: Her voice was a soothing folksong in the chaos of the city.
meanings.sent5: The folksong echoed through the valley, carrying memories of the past.

meanings.definition: A traditional or indigenous song of a particular region or culture.
meanings.sent1: The folksong of the tribe was passed down through generations.
meanings.sent2: During the festival, everyone joined in singing the folksong of their ancestors.
meanings.sent3: The folksong of the mountains had a melody that lingered in the air.
meanings.sent4: His heart beat in rhythm with the folksong of his homeland.
meanings.sent5: The folksong of the sea whispered secrets of ancient sailors.
